meanings.definition: The last part of a piece of music, a performance, or a public event.
meanings.sent1: The orchestra played the grand finale with all their instruments.
meanings.sent2: The fireworks display marked the exciting finale of the show.
meanings.sent3: The finale of the concert left the audience cheering for more.
meanings.sent4: As the sun set, nature's finale painted the sky in vibrant colors.
meanings.sent5: The finale of the play was so powerful, it left everyone in awe.

meanings.definition: The concluding part of a performance or entertainment.
meanings.sent1: The magician's finale involved a disappearing act that amazed the audience.
meanings.sent2: The dance troupe's finale was a high-energy routine that brought the house down.
meanings.sent3: The finale of the movie revealed a surprising plot twist that left viewers stunned.
meanings.sent4: The chef's dessert was the perfect finale to a delicious meal.
meanings.sent5: The finale of the book tied up all the loose ends in a satisfying way.
